html: Is this the football Gods now crying on the trophy presentation due to that VAR decision?
text: Is this the football Gods now crying on the trophy presentation due to that VAR decision?

html: That VAR decision killed the Croatians momentum. Really feel for them. Very harsh. France clinical on the counter but the better side lost for me. Sometimes It’s better to be lucky than good!
text:
That VAR decision killed the Croatians momentum. Really feel for them. Very harsh.

France clinical on the counter but the better side lost for me. 

Sometimes It’s better to be lucky than good!

text: If that’s given against Norway in a WC final, would you say exactly the same thing? https://twitter.com/jariiseofficial/status/1018532520147718144 …

html: But it flicked of Balaise Mutuidi’s Head a yard in front of him and deviated. Impossible to get his hand out of the way. It has to be ‘clear and obvious’. It’s not about the ball just hitting the hand. https://twitter.com/danflynn1985/status/1018521849309822978 …
text: But it flicked of Balaise Mutuidi’s Head a yard in front of him and deviated. Impossible to get his hand out of the way. It has to be ‘clear and obvious’. It’s not about the ball just hitting the hand. https://twitter.com/danflynn1985/status/1018521849309822978 …

html: If the ref decides in real time it’s not a pen. That should be that. Nobody in the ear. If he’s unsure, he should be allowed to check. We don’t need 5 people in a studio somewhere else. Just copy both codes of Rugby. It works!
text: If the ref decides in real time it’s not a pen. That should be that. Nobody in the ear. If he’s unsure, he should be allowed to check. We don’t need 5 people in a studio somewhere else. Just copy both codes of Rugby. It works!

html: When used correctly VAR can enhance the game. No doubt. Just feel its way to inconsistent at this moment. Even the replays the ref watches are poor.
text: When used correctly VAR can enhance the game. No doubt. Just feel its way to inconsistent at this moment. Even the replays the ref watches are poor.

html: No way the player has time to react and think I’m moving my hand towards that to knock it out of play. It happens too quickly and just hits his hand for me. No way a pen!
text: No way the player has time to react and think I’m moving my hand towards that to knock it out of play. It happens too quickly and just hits his hand for me. No way a pen!

html: If you think that’s a pen you’re either French or you’ve never played football. Could ruin a great game that. How is Perisic meant to get out of the way of that? Hope that’s not the key moment.
text:
If you think that’s a pen you’re either French or you’ve never played football. Could ruin a great game that. 

How is Perisic meant to get out of the way of that? 

Hope that’s not the key moment.

html: I mean how is that a pen? How can he get his hand out of the way? Shambles...
text: I mean how is that a pen? How can he get his hand out of the way? Shambles...

html: What a start. Croatia deservedly level... #WorldCup18
text: What a start. Croatia deservedly level... #WorldCup18

html: What a story it would be for Croatia to lift the World Cup. Formed in 1991 and a population of 4m. What players they’ve had in a short space of time. Boban, Suker, Prosinecki, Boksic and of course Modric. France clear favourite but I’d like to get one. They’re a team
text:
What a story it would be for Croatia to lift the World Cup. Formed in 1991 and a population of 4m. 

What players they’ve had in a short space of time. Boban, Suker, Prosinecki, Boksic and of course Modric. 

France clear favourite but I’d like  to get one. They’re a team

html: We need to learn our lessons from the tournament and come back stronger. No nearer to ‘winning’ a major tournament but won hearts and minds and now must build on that.
text: We need to learn our lessons from the tournament and come back stronger. No nearer to ‘winning’ a major tournament but won hearts and minds and now must build on that.

html: Training methods clearly wrong. Watt bike sessions between games in a tournament. Croatia had played ET for 3rd straight match against Eng. we looked legged and severely fatigued during ET.
text: Training methods clearly wrong. Watt bike sessions between games in a tournament. Croatia had played ET for 3rd straight match against Eng. we looked legged and severely fatigued during ET.

html: In my opinion a better manager could have won the competition. 6 defensive players on the pitch far too often. Especially when 2-1 down in WC semi final. Also 0/10 outfield players left footed. Team lacked balance.
text: In my opinion a better manager could have won the competition. 6 defensive players on the pitch far too often. Especially when 2-1 down in WC semi final. Also 0/10 outfield players left footed. Team lacked balance.

html: Stand by my Southgate comments when he was appointed. Lovely guy. Comes out of the tournament with a fantastic respect. He’s won hearts and minds.
text: Stand by my Southgate comments when he was appointed. Lovely guy. Comes out of the tournament with a fantastic respect. He’s won hearts and minds.

html: Don’t let that mask the fact they’ve played 4 decent teams. They’ve lost 3 times (Belgium x2 and Croatia) and drawn the other (Winning on penalties against Colombia)in fact we’ve beaten Tunisia, Panama and Sweden. Let’s not get carried away just yet.
text: Don’t let that mask the fact they’ve played 4 decent teams. They’ve lost 3 times (Belgium x2 and Croatia) and drawn the other (Winning on penalties against Colombia)in fact we’ve beaten Tunisia, Panama and Sweden. Let’s not get carried away just yet.

html: The World Cup has been a fantastic PR campaign for England football team. They’ve reconnected with supporters that have in recent years felt alienated from the team.
text: The World Cup has been a fantastic PR campaign for England football team. They’ve reconnected with supporters that have in recent years felt alienated from the team.

html: Remember, the greatest failure is not to try. Well done lads. Safe trip home
text:
Remember, the greatest failure is not to try. 

Well done lads.

Safe trip home

html: Proud of the lads. Gave us great entertainment all summer. They come back with a lot more respect than they went. Will we ever get a better chance?
text:
Proud of the lads. Gave us great entertainment all summer. They come back with a lot more respect than they went. 

Will we ever get a better chance?
